According to Eric Schmidt : Larry will now lead product development and technology strategy, his greatest strengths, and starting from April 4 he will take charge of our day-to-day operations as Google's Chief Executive Officer. In this new role I know he will merge Google's technology and business vision brilliantly. The third leg of the triumvirate, Sergey Brin , will take the title of Co-Founder, focusing on new products. One of the co-founders of the Independent newspaper Stephen Glover recently wondered why Chancellor George Osborne had co-written an editorial piece with outgoing Google CEO Eric Schmidt . I can't imagine a member of the Government doing a piece with Rupert Murdoch , Glover noted. You can imagine the reaction if he had. What's good for Google, it seems, must be good for the UK. Guantanamo one of worlds finest prison: Donald Rumsfeld WASHINGTON( AFP)- The`` war on terror'' prison at the US naval base in Guantanamo Bay, Cuba is one of the finest prison systems in the world, former defense secretary Donald Rumsfeld said in an interview with Fox News on Tuesday. Op het matje Donald Rumsfeld vertrok uiteindelijk twee jaar later, een dag na de tussentijdse Congresverkiezingen in de VS, waarbij de Republikeinse partij van president President Bush gevoelige klappen opliep. Ik had al besloten dat ik niet zou blijven als de Democraten de macht in het Congres zouden overnemen , schrijft de oud-minister. Donald Rumsfeld voorzag dat hij om de haverklap op het matje zou worden geroepen bij een Democratisch Congres.`` Dit betekende dat het tijd was om sommige mensen te vervangen.''
